mapper.select: select top ${pageSize} a.id,a.title,a.comments,a.createtime,a.endtime,a.state,a.level, d.id as PK_deviceid,d.device_id,d.devicetype_id,d.model,d.comments as devicecomments,d.longitude,d.latitude,d.area_id, d.firstuptime,d.updatetime,d.state as devicestate,d.datastatus as devicedatestatus from (select row_number()over(order by alert.createtime desc)rownumber,* from alert)a join devices d on a.device_id = d.id where rownumber>${itemIndex}

select top ${pageSize} a.id,a.title,a.comments,a.createtime,a.endtime,a.state,a.level, d.id as PK_deviceid,d.device_id,d.devicetype_id,d.model,d.comments as devicecomments,d.longitude,d.latitude,d.area_id, d.firstuptime,d.updatetime,d.state as devicestate,d.datastatus as devicedatestatus from (select row_number()over(order by alert.createtime desc)rownumber,* from alert)a join devices d on a.device_id = d.id where rownumber>${itemIndex} and a.device_id = ${deviceId}
